# Announcement Details
### **Project Title**
Three Senior Database Analysts
### **Solicitation Number**
202303987/A
### **Publication Date**
March 2, 2023
### **Closing Date and Time**
March 30, 2023 at 2:00 PM Eastern Standard Time (EST)
### **Trade Agreements**
Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB)

# Purpose and Scope
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires three (3) Senior Database Analysts under the Task Based and Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) Supply Arrangement. The successful bidder will provide expertise to support the Police Information Analysis Centre (PIAC) in the development and maintenance of databases and other information systems.

# Eligibility and Requirements
This procurement is set aside for Indigenous businesses in compliance with the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB). Eligible suppliers must be registered with the Government of Canada's contract database (MERX) and have a valid Municiopal Registration Tribunal (MRT) account. 

## Level of Security Requirement
The RCMP requires a minimum Security Clearance of Secret.

# Evaluation and Selection
The evaluation criteria are as follows:

1. Technically responsive bid
2. Lowest evaluated price

The evaluation process will be based on the mandatory criteria and will result in the selection of the bidder who meets the requirements and has the lowest price.

# Procurement Information
The procurement will be conducted in accordance with the Government of Canada's procurement policy and the TBIPS Supply Arrangement. Interested suppliers may submit a request for access to the solicitation document.

# Important Contacts and Registration
For more information, please contact:

* Hannah State, Procurement Officer at: (506) 238-0450 or Hannah.State@rcmp-grc.gc.ca

To register for the Indigenous Business Directory, please visit: [https://www.canada.ca/indigenousbusinessdirectory](https://www.canada.ca/indigenousbusinessdirectory)
